response:
[Start Video]

[0:00-0:05]
(Transition slide with text: "Welcome to Ola Service Subscription Offerings")

[0:06-0:10]
(Narrator Voiceover)
"Welcome to Ola's service subscription offerings, designed to provide you peace of mind and convenience."

[0:11-0:15]
(Show visuals of Ola Care and Ola Care Plus)
"We offer two tiers of subscription plans, Ola Care and Ola Care Plus."

[0:16-0:20]
(Show visuals of benefits)
"Enjoy benefits like free labor service, theft assistance, and roadside assistance."

[0:21-0:25]
(Show visuals of extended warranty)
"Extend your warranty to five years with our comprehensive and battery-only extended warranty plans."

[0:26-0:30]
(Show visuals of Ola accessories)
"Enhance your Ola experience with our range of accessories like center stand, buddy step, and scooter cover."

[0:31-0:35]
(Show visuals of Ola merchandise)
"Join the Ola revolution with our graphic printed T-shirts available on our website and app."

[0:36-0:40]
(Show visuals of purchasing process)
"Purchasing is easy. Simply select your plan or product, complete the payment, and your order is complete."

[0:41-0:45]
(Show visuals of delivery process)
"Your merchandise will be delivered based on your preference, either at your doorstep or at our Ola Experience Center."

[0:46-0:50]
(Narrator Voiceover)
"Join us at Ola for a convenient, cost-effective, and eco-friendly ride."

[End Video]
